changeSet.author: KFS503
changeSet.comment: KFSCNTRB-1343 Create new parameters for AR Lockbox Upload

column.name: VAL
column.value: SEE END OF MESSAGE FOR TRANSMISSION STATUS REPORT. {INSERT AR CONTACT INFORMATION HERE} (Primary contact listed above can revise recipients or contents of this message.)

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: This parameter is to store the details for AR lockbox contacts.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Email subject line for the lockbox load summary and error notification email.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Email address to receive lockbox load summary and error notification email.

changeSet.author: KFS503
changeSet.comment: KFSCNTRB-990 Create new parameters for defaulting Vendor commodity on REQS accting lines

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Indicates whether vendor commodity code will be auto-populated. Will not override user-specified values.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The item classification that denotes the commodity code in the cxml returned from the B2B cart.

changeSet.author: KFS503
changeSet.comment: KFSCNTRB-1380 Payment Terms table misused for Payment calculation resulting in incorrect Terms being printed on PO and being sent to supplier.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Indicates the number of days that should be subtracted from the calculated pay date to ensure payment is made on time. This parameter can be used to manipulate pay date to ensure payments to vendors meet discount requirements or to account for holidays that may interfere with payment schedules.
